description.fr: Vaincre tous les Chuchoteurs. \--- Lorsqu'un monstre a moins de {value:perc, percent} de sa {%PVMAX}\_: Lui confère {PropertyEffect:19}. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} {PA_RESvalue:pa,+}.
description.en: Defeat all the Whisperers. \--- When a monster has less than {value:perc, percent} of its {%PVMAX}: Confers {PropertyEffect:19} on it. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} {PA_RESvalue:pa,+}.
description.es: Vencer a todos los susurradores. \--- Cuando un monstruo tiene menos de un {value:perc, percent} de su {%PVMAX}: Le confiere {PropertyEffect:19}. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} {PA_RESvalue:pa,+}.
description.de: Alle Flüsterer besiegen. \--- Wenn ein Monster weniger als {value:perc, percent} seiner {%PVMAX} hat: Verleiht ihm {PropertyEffect:19}. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} {PA_RESvalue:pa,+}.
description.pt: Derrotar todos os Sussurradores. \--- Quando um monstro tiver menos de {value:perc, percent} de seus {%PVMAX}: Concede a ele {PropertyEffect:19}. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} {PA_RESvalue:pa,+}.
